author: CS
title: Wonder Woman Rating Officially Announced
text:
SHARE Wonder Woman rating officially announced 
The MPAA has officially announced the Wonder Woman rating. The Warner Bros. Pictures and DC Entertainment has been rated PG-13 “for sequences of violence and action, and some suggestive content.” As far as recent comic book movies go, it’s pretty similar to the Suicide Squad and Doctor Strange ratings, though not as extreme as the R rating for Logan , of course. 
Wonder Woman stars Gal Gadot ( Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice ), Chris Pine ( Star Trek ), Robin Wright ( The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo , Netflix’s House of Cards ), Danny Huston ( Clash of the Titans , X-Men Origins: Wolverine ), Ewen Bremner ( Exodus: Gods and Kings , Snowpiercer ), Saïd Taghmaoui ( American Hustle) , Elena Anaya ( The Skin I Live In ), Connie Nielsen ( Gladiator , Nymphomaniac: Vol. I ) and Lucy Davis ( Shaun of the Dead ). 
The film is being produced by Charles Roven, Zack Snyder and Deborah Snyder, with Richard Suckle, Stephen Jones, Wesley Coller, Geoff Johns and Rebecca Roven serving as executive producers. 
Wonder Woman opens in theaters on June 2, 2017. It will be the fourth film in the newly-launched DC Cinematic Universe, following 2013’s Man of Steel and last year’s Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice and Suicide Squad . It will be followed in 2017 on November 17 with the highly-anticipated Justice League movie.
